eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mobile, AL; AT 02:41 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:42 AM SEP 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Mobile County 911 is not affected by the State-Wide Outage. All 911 Services are fully operational. Please reserve 911 for emergencies only.
